name: Pyramid Solitaire for iPhone.
description:
Enjoy Pyramid Solitaire and its variations completely free on your iPhone or iPod Touch today!

Features:

. Contains the classic Pyramid Solitaire game
. Includes Giza and Tut's Tomb solitaires also
. Easy to see cards
. 3D animation effects
. Finger matching technology for easy card movement
. Multiple card decks and backgrounds available
. Option to hide the menu bar for full screen enjoyment
. Online high scores - compete with players across the world!
. Made by GrassGames and adheres to the their high quality standards


For those looking for a high quality and free Pyramid solitaire game, look no further.
